title: New: Blood Cultures – Indian Summer
body:
With only one track on his Soundcloud, uploaded a matter of hours ago, it’s safe to say that **Blood Cultures** is about as fresh as they come.

Part LCD Soundsystem (that synth line, man), part blog-friendly R&B, his debut track _Indian Summer_ is a mightily exciting introduction to his music. Check out Indian Summer below, and pick it up via the **Blood Cultures** [Bandcamp](http://bloodcultures.bandcamp.com/).
